level.text: The Board shall issue a license to practice respiratory therapy, by endorsement, to an Applicant who:
Is currently licensed or certified by another state;
Is in good standing under the laws of another state with standards that the Board determines to be comparable to the requirements of the Act and this chapter; and

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: As amended by Final Rulemaking published at 46 DCR 7282 (September 17, 1999).
